cz.opendata.tenderstats

Class AbstractComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • cz.opendata.tenderstats.AbstractComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DemoComponent, Matchmaker, PCFilingApp, SystemManager, Utils

    public abstract class AbstractComponent
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    Abstract servlet component to be used in cz.opendata.tenderstats project.
    Author:
    Matej Snoha
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • serialVersionUID

        private static final long serialVersionUID
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • config

        protected ComponentConfiguration config
        Holds component configuration needed for network communication with databases and other values.
        Needs to be initialized first with value returned by getConfiguration() before first use.
        If the init() method is called, it happens automatically.

        Values stored here apply only for this instance of the servlet and are not automatically synchronized with the relational database, deployment descriptor or concurrently running instances.

      • getUserContext

        protected UserContext getUserContext(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        This methods checks if a user is logged in and returns an UserContext object associated with session
        Parameters:
        request - HTTP Request from user
        Returns:
        UserContext associated with logged in user or null if no such user exists.

      • getUserContext

        protected UserContext getUserContext(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                         boolean reloadFromRdb)
        This methods checks if a user is logged in and returns an UserContext object associated with session.
        Parameters:
        request - HTTP Request from user
        reloadFromRdb - If set, UserContext in session is first updated from relational database.
        Returns:
        UserContext associated with logged in user or null if no such user exists.

      • doGetPost

        protected void doGetPost(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         javax.servlet.ServletException
        Processes GET or POST request and returns response. Override this method to process the input data and return response.
        Alternatively, override what you want in the following chains:
        Servlet Container --> service --> doGet --> doGetPost
        Servlet Container --> service --> doPost --> doGetPost
        Servlet Container --> service --> doOptions
        ...
        Parameters:
        request -
        response -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        javax.servlet.ServletException
